item-menu-viewAttachment.label.string: Open {numAttachments, plural, one {{attachmentType, select, pdf {PDF} epub {EPUB} snapshot {Snapshot} other {Attachment}}} other {{attachmentType, select, pdf {PDFs} epub {EPUBs} snapshot {Snapshots} other {Attachments}}}} {openIn, select, tab {in New Tab} window {in New Window} other {}}

create-parent-intro.string: Enter a DOI, ISBN, PMID, arXiv ID, or ADS Bibcode to identify this file:

update-updates-found-intro-minor.string: An update for { app-name } is available:

update-updates-found-desc.string: It is recommended that you apply this update as soon as possible.

import-where-from.string: Where do you want to import from?

import-source-file.label.string: A file (BibTeX, RIS, Zotero RDF, etc.)

import-source-folder.label.string: A folder of PDFs or other files

import-create-collection.label.string: Place imported collections and items into new collection

import-file-handling-store.label.string: Copy files to the { app-name } storage folder

import-file-handling-link.label.string: Link to files in original location

import-fileHandling-description.string: Linked files cannot be synced by { app-name }.

import-online-new.label.string: Download new items only; don’t update previously imported items

file-interface-import-error.string: An error occurred while trying to import the selected file. Please ensure that the file is valid and try again.

file-interface-items-were-imported.string: {numItems, plural, =0 {No items were imported} one {One item was imported} other {{ numItems } items were imported}}

file-interface-items-were-relinked.string: {numRelinked, plural, =0 {No items were relinked} one {One item was relinked} other {{ numRelinked } items were relinked}}

import-mendeley-encrypted.string: The selected Mendeley database cannot be read, likely because it is encrypted. See How do I import a Mendeley library into Zotero? for more information.

file-interface-import-error-translator.string: An error occurred importing the selected file with “{ translator }”. Please ensure that the file is valid and try again.

import-online-intro.string: In the next step you will be asked to log in to { targetAppOnline } and grant { app-name } access. This is necessary to import your { targetApp } library into { app-name }.

import-online-intro2.string: { app-name } will never see or store your { targetApp } password.

import-online-form-intro.string: Please enter your credentials to log in to { targetAppOnline }. This is necessary to import your { targetApp } library into { app-name }.

import-online-wrong-credentials.string: Login to { targetApp } failed. Please re-enter credentials and try again.

import-online-blocked-by-plugin.string: The import cannot continue with { plugin } installed. Please disable this plugin and try again.

import-online-connection-error.string: { app-name } could not connect to { targetApp }. Please check your internet connection and try again.

items-table-cell-notes.aria-label.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Note} other {{ count } Notes}}

rtfScan-introPage-description.string: { app-name } can automatically extract and reformat citations and insert a bibliography into RTF files. To get started, choose an RTF file below.

rtfScan-introPage-description2.string: To get started, select an RTF input file and an output file below:

rtfScan-scanPage-description.string: { app-name } is scanning your document for citations. Please be patient.

rtfScan-citations-page-description.string: Please review the list of recognized citations below to ensure that { app-name } has selected the corresponding items correctly. Any unmapped or ambiguous citations must be resolved before proceeding to the next step.

rtfScan-format-page-description.string: { app-name } is processing and formatting your RTF file. Please be patient.

rtfScan-complete-page-description.string: Your document has now been scanned and processed. Please ensure that it is formatted correctly.

integration-prefs-bookmarks-description.string: Bookmarks can be shared between Word and LibreOffice, but may cause errors if accidentally modified and cannot be inserted into footnotes.

integration-prefs-bookmarks-formatNotice.string: {show, select, true {The document must be saved as .doc or .docx.} other {}}

integration-prefs-automaticCitationUpdat.string: Citations with pending updates will be highlighted in the document
Disabling updates can speed up citation insertion in large documents. Click Refresh to update citations manually.

integration-prefs-automaticJournalAbbevi.string: The “Journal Abbr” field will be ignored.

integration-prefs-exportDocument.label.string: Switch to a Different Word Processor…

publications-intro.string: Items you add to My Publications will be shown on your profile page on zotero.org. If you choose to include attached files, they will be made publicly available under the license you specify. Only add work you yourself have created, and only include files if you have the rights to distribute them and wish to do so.

publications-include-adjust-at-any-time.string: You can adjust what to show at any time from the My Publications collection.

publications-intro-authorship-files.labe.string: I created this work and have the rights to distribute included files.

publications-sharing-page.label.string: Choose how your work may be shared

publications-sharing-keep-rights-field-w.string: Keep the existing Rights field where available

publications-sharing-text.string: You can reserve all rights to your work, license it under a Creative Commons license, or dedicate it to the public domain. In all cases, the work will be made publicly available via zotero.org.

publications-sharing-prompt.string: Would you like to allow your work to be shared by others?

publications-sharing-reserved.label.string: No, only publish my work on zotero.org

publications-sharing-cc.label.string: Yes, under a Creative Commons license

publications-sharing-cc0.label.string: Yes, and place my work in the public domain

publications-choose-license-text.string: A Creative Commons license allows others to copy and redistribute your work as long as they give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. Additional conditions can be specified below.

publications-choose-license-adaptations-.string: Allow adaptations of your work to be shared?

publications-choose-license-sharealike.l.string: Yes, as long as others share alike

publications-choose-license-commercial-p.string: Allow commercial uses of your work?

licenses-cc-more-info.string: Be sure you have read the Creative Commons Considerations for licensors before placing your work under a CC license. Note that the license you apply cannot be revoked, even if you later choose different terms or cease publishing the work.

licenses-cc0-more-info.string: Be sure you have read the Creative Commons CC0 FAQ before applying CC0 to your work. Please note that dedicating your work to the public domain is irreversible, even if you later choose different terms or cease publishing the work.

restart-in-troubleshooting-mode-dialog-d.string: { app-name } will restart with all plugins disabled. Some features may not function correctly while Troubleshooting Mode is enabled.

section-attachments.label.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Attachment} other {{ count } Attachments}}

section-attachments-annotations.label.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Annotation} other {{ count } Annotations}}

section-notes.label.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Note} other {{ count } Notes}}

section-tags.label.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Tag} other {{ count } Tags}}

annotations-count.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } Annotation} other {{ count } Annotations}}

attachment-info-convert-note.label.string: Migrate to {type, select, standalone {Standalone} child {Item} unknown {New}} Note

attachment-info-convert-note.tooltiptext.string: Adding notes to attachments is no longer supported, but you can edit this note by migrating it to a separate note.

toggle-preview.label.string: {type, select, open {Hide} collapsed {Show} unknown {Toggle}} Attachment Preview

quickformat-general-instructions.string: Use Left/Right Arrow to navigate the items of this citation. {dialogMenu, select, active {Press Shift-Tab to focus the dialog's menu.} other {}} Press { return-or-enter } to save edits to this citation. Press Escape to discard the changes and close the dialog.

quickformat-aria-bubble.string: This item is included in the citation. Press space bar to customize the item. { quickformat-general-instructions }

quickformat-aria-input.string: Type to search for an item to include in this citation. Press Tab to navigate the list of search results. { quickformat-general-instructions }

quickformat-aria-item.string: Press { return-or-enter } to add this item to the citation. Press Tab to go back to the search field.

insert-note-aria-input.string: Type to search for a note. Press Tab to navigate the list of results. Press Escape to close the dialog.

insert-note-aria-item.string: Press { return-or-enter } to select this note. Press Tab to go back to the search field. Press Escape to close the dialog.

item-pane-message-items-selected.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } item selected} other {{ count } items selected}}

item-pane-message-collections-selected.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } collection selected} other {{ count } collections selected}}

item-pane-message-searches-selected.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } search selected} other {{ count } searches selected}}

item-pane-message-objects-selected.string: {count, plural, one {{ count } object selected} other {{ count } objects selected}}

locate-library-lookup-no-resolver.string: You must choose a resolver from the { pane } pane of the { app-name } settings.

architecture-win32-warning-message.string: { app-name } is running in 32-bit mode on a 64-bit version of Windows. { app-name } will run more efficiently in 64-bit mode.

first-run-guidance-quickFormat.string:
Type a title, author, and/or year to search for a reference.

After you’ve made your selection, click the bubble or select it via the keyboard and press ↓/Space to show citation options such as page number, prefix, and suffix.

You can also add a page number directly by including it with your search terms or typing it after the bubble and pressing { return-or-enter }.

first-run-guidance-authorMenu.string: { app-name } lets you specify editors and translators too. You can turn an author into an editor or translator by selecting from this menu.

preferences-auto-recognize-files.label.string: Automatically retrieve metadata for PDFs and ebooks

preferences-file-renaming-intro.string: { app-name } automatically renames downloaded files based on the details of the parent item (title, author, etc.). You can choose to rename files added from your computer as well.

preferences-file-renaming-format-instruc.string: You can customize the filename pattern { app-name } uses to rename attachment files from parent metadata.
For example, “{ example }” in this template will be replaced with the title of the parent item, truncated at 50 characters.

preferences-reader-open-in-new-window.la.string: Open files in new windows instead of tabs

preferences-locate-library-lookup-intro.string: Library Lookup can find a resource online using your library’s OpenURL resolver.

preferences-styleManager-add-button.tool.string: Add a style from a file

preferences-advanced-enable-local-api.la.string: Allow other applications on this computer to communicate with { app-name }
